io.github.samwright.framework.model.helper

Class ParentManager<C extends ChildOf<P> & Processor,P extends ParentOf<C> & Processor>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.samwright.framework.model.helper.ParentManager<C,P>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChildOf<P>

    public class ParentManager<C extends ChildOf<P> & Processor,P extends ParentOf<C> & Processor>
extends Object
implements ChildOf<P>
    A helper object that manages a child's parent in an EventuallyImmutable parent-child hierarchy.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ParentManager(C managedChild)
      Create a ParentManager to manage the given child's parent, which is initially set to null.
      ParentManager(C managedChild, P parent)
      Create a ParentManage to manage the given child's given parent.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void beforeReplacing(C toReplace)
      Called before the managed child replaces another child.
      void discardNext()
      Called when the managed child is having its replacement discarded, and tells its parent to discard its replacement.
      void discardPrevious()
      Called when the managed child is having its older versions discarded, and tells its parent to discard its older versions.
      void orphanChild() 
      void setAsCurrentVersion()
      Called when the managed child is being set as the current version, and instructs its parent to do the same.
      C withParent(P newParent)
      Return a version of this with the given parent.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Methods inherited from interface io.github.samwright.framework.model.common.ChildOf

        getParent

        Create a ParentManager to manage the given child's parent, which is initially set to null.

      • ParentManager

        public ParentManager(@NonNull
             C managedChild,
             P parent)
        Create a ParentManage to manage the given child's given parent.
        Parameters:
        managedChild - the child who's parent this will manage.
        parent - the child's parent.

    • Method Detail

      • withParent

        public C withParent(P newParent)
        Description copied from interface: ChildOf
        Return a version of this with the given parent.

        If this object can be mutated it will be, with this being returned. Otherwise a clone of this will be created with the given parent.

        Specified by:
        withParent in interface ChildOf<P extends ParentOf<C> & Processor>
        Parameters:
        newParent - the parent to be given to the returned object.
        Returns:
        a version of this with the given parent.

      • beforeReplacing

        public void beforeReplacing(C toReplace)
        Called before the managed child replaces another child.

        One of two scenarios caused this update

        1. A property of the parent was changed

        2. A property of the managed child was changed

        Parameters:
        toReplace - the child that managedChild will replace

      • orphanChild

        public void orphanChild()

      • discardNext

        public void discardNext()
        Called when the managed child is having its replacement discarded, and tells its parent to discard its replacement.

      • discardPrevious

        public void discardPrevious()
        Called when the managed child is having its older versions discarded, and tells its parent to discard its older versions.

      • setAsCurrentVersion

        public void setAsCurrentVersion()
        Called when the managed child is being set as the current version, and instructs its parent to do the same.
